basics.name: Nick Butler
basics.label: Technical Manager/Cloud Solution Engineer
basics.summary: Nick is a passionate technologist with 10 years of experience in IT delivering solutions ranging from bespoke web and mobile applications to big data cloud platforms. His blend of skills makes him a highly versatile individual who approaches projects with diligence, fervor and honesty and a desire for high quality outcomes. When he's not hacking at the command line, he can be found enjoying fantasy novels, gaming or just generally procrastinating on the internet. He also enjoys cycling, snowboarding and photography.

work.summary: Starting as a senior developer in the company's small, specialised Cloud Services team, responsible for maintenance and development of monolithic Rails application, architecture and engineering of advanced analytics platform and software development for a variety of data and analytics projects. Later promoted to manager as a technical lead in platform operations and delivery.
highlights: Deputy lead of C3's DnA Ops competency
Established as a leader in AWS solution architecture

Key resource in the design and development of hosted analytics platform. A scalable solution which supports large scale data ingest, ETL, MPP analytics and real time processing. Targeting cloud platforms AWS and Azure, supporting distributed computing using EMR, Redshift, Hadoop and Spark, etc.
Architectural development of big data platform to support processing and management of terabyte scale data analytics. Built on AWS with a focus on high availability and fault tolerance

Development and maintenance of data quality and validation application. Large complex Ruby on Rails application supporting advanced database management with group access controls, complex and aggregate data validation
Runs presentations on version control, DevOps
Delivered workshops on functional programming principles, good software development practices and AWS cloud computing
Contributed to development and presentation of prototype cyber security platform for a Big Four bank

work.summary: Senior Ruby on Rails developer in fast paced digital agency. Development of many websites ranging from single page promotional sites to full e-commerce sites. End to end involvement in projects with full client interaction.
highlights: Online ordering apps for large wholesale foods distributor. Monolithic PHP Zend application and iOS app consuming SOAP web service.
Development of iOS tablet app and accompanying content management API site for large beverage manufacturer. Featuring review/release workflow.
Internal CMS system used to power majority of client sites featuring custom Capistrano scripts for rapid deployment.

work.summary: Various PHP development projects, managing multiple project and clients.
Lead developer for account administration site for telecom provider. Integration with PBX systems & online payments. Administration of Linux hosting and deployment.
Member of internal web development team for successful hosting company, producing client sites with in house PHP CMS system.
